Package tk.borroot.player.reinforcement.qlearning

Class Actions

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.borroot.player.reinforcement.qlearning.Actions
  • class Actions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the different values for the possible actions from a given board state. So this represents one row in the Q-learning table.
    Author:
    Bram Pulles

    • Field Detail

      • moves

        private java.lang.Float[] moves

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actions

        Actions​(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> moves)
        Create a new actions object with the specified moves (actions). Each actions will have an initial value of 0f.
        Parameters:
        moves - valid moves

    • Method Detail

      • bestMove

        int bestMove()
        Best move will return the best move in the available actions. It will return one of the best moves if there are multiple moves with the same best value.

        Note that this function should not be called if there are no moves available.

        Returns:
        one of the best moves

      • maxValue

        public float maxValue()
        This function will be called to estimate the optimal future value. So this is the maximum value of all the possible actions available.
        Returns:
        the maximum value of all the possible actions available if non then 0

      • set

        public void set​(int move,
                float value)
        Set the value for a move (action).
        Parameters:
        move - (action) to be set
        value - to be assigned to the action

      • get

        public float get​(int move)
        Get the value of a move (action).
        Parameters:
        move - to be get
        Returns:
        the value assigned to the move

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
